title: Firebase Google Sign-In Successful Login
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using Firebase Google Sign-In authentication.

steps.description: Open the TripWise application on a supported mobile device.
Click on the 'Sign in with Google' button.
Select a valid Google account and complete the authentication process.
Verify that the user is logged in and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: Firebase Email/Password Authentication Failure
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen of TripWise.
Enter a valid email but incorrect password.
Press the login button.
Confirm that login is denied and an error message about invalid credentials is displayed.
Repeat with invalid email format.
Confirm that the app displays an error about invalid email format.

title: AI-Assisted Trip Itinerary Generation
description: Verify that the AI travel agent generates relevant, personalized itineraries based on user preferences.

steps.description: Log in to the app and navigate to the trip planning section.
Input trip preferences including destination, duration, interests, and budget.
Request AI to generate an itinerary.
Verify an itinerary is generated with detailed scheduling, activities, and relevant recommendations.
Confirm that all preferences are reflected in the itinerary.

title: Manual Editing of Travel Plan Activities
description: Validate that users can add, edit, and delete travel activities in an itinerary manually.

steps.description: Open an existing trip plan with or without AI-generated itinerary.
Add a new activity with name, time, and notes.
Verify that the activity is added correctly and saved.
Edit the newly added activity details.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected accurately.
Delete the activity.
Confirm the activity is removed from the itinerary.

title: Real-Time Expense Addition and Budget Synchronization
description: Check that expenses can be added, categorized, and budgets update immediately with group synchronization.

steps.description: Open a travel plan with expense tracking enabled.
Add an expense with amount, category, and description.
Confirm that the expense appears instantly in the expense list.
Verify the budget balance adjusts accordingly in real-time.
Have another invited user open the same trip plan.
Ensure the expense and budget updates sync to the second user without delay or conflicts.

title: Collaborative Trip Sharing and Update Synchronization
description: Verify multiple users can share a trip plan and see real-time updates without conflicts or data loss.

steps.description: User A creates a trip plan and invites User B to collaborate.
User B accepts the invitation and accesses the trip plan.
User A adds a new activity or updates existing details.
User B's app reflects the changes in real-time.
User B modifies an expense or itinerary detail.
User A's app shows the updated information immediately and correctly.

title: Multi-language Text and Image Translation Accuracy
description: Test the accuracy and responsiveness of multi-language translation for both text inputs and images.

steps.description: Open the translation tool in the app.
Input text in a source language and request translation to a target language.
Verify that translation is accurate and contextually relevant.
Upload an image containing text for image translation.
Confirm the extracted text and translation are accurate and displayed correctly.

title: Weather Forecasts and Alerts Functionality
description: Ensure detailed weather forecasts display correctly and significant weather alerts trigger notifications.

steps.description: Access the weather forecast feature for a selected travel destination.
Verify that detailed weather data such as temperature, precipitation, and wind is shown correctly.
Simulate significant weather changes or warnings.
Confirm that smart notifications are sent to the user informing them about weather warnings.

title: Currency Conversion Accuracy and Performance
description: Validate currency exchange rates are current and conversions between currencies are accurate and quick.

steps.description: Open the currency conversion tool.
Select source and target currencies and input an amount.
Confirm the converted amount is accurate based on the latest exchange rates.
Validate that conversion happens quickly without noticeable delay.

title: Map Integration and Navigation Display
description: Test Google Maps integration for location viewing, searching, and navigation within the app.

steps.description: Navigate to a trip itinerary location view.
Search for a location within the itinerary.
Verify that the searched location is displayed correctly on the map.
Request directions or navigation for an itinerary activity location.
Ensure navigation routes are displayed accurately and navigation updates correctly with user movement.

title: Smart Notification Delivery and Accuracy
description: Check that notifications for activity reminders, budget alerts, and weather warnings are delivered timely and correctly.

steps.description: Set an upcoming activity reminder with specific date and time.
Set a budget limit to trigger budget alert notifications.
Simulate relevant weather warning condition.
Verify that activity reminder notification is received at the scheduled time.
Confirm that budget overrun notification is triggered when expenses exceed the limit.
Validate timely delivery of weather alert notifications.

title: Profile Management and Historical Travel Statistics Viewing
description: Verify users can update their profile data and view aggregated travel statistics without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the profile management section.
Edit profile details including name, email, and preferences.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in the profile.
Access the historical travel statistics view.
Verify that travel statistics such as number of trips, expenses, and destinations visited are displayed correctly.

title: API Endpoint Responsiveness and Error Handling Under Load
description: Ensure backend RESTful API endpoints respond correctly and gracefully handle errors during expected load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent API requests to common endpoints (login, itinerary, expenses).
Verify all requests respond within acceptable time limits and without data corruption.
Simulate network failures or malformed requests to backend endpoints.
Confirm API responds with appropriate error codes and messages without crashing.

title: Third-Party Service Failure Handling
description: Verify that the app correctly handles failures or downtime of Firebase, LangChain, and Google Maps services.

steps.description: Simulate Firebase authentication service downtime.
Confirm app shows meaningful error and prevents login until service is restored.
Simulate LangChain AI Travel Agent service unavailability.
Verify that AI itinerary generation fails gracefully with user notification.
Simulate Google Maps API failure or quota limit reached.
Confirm maps and navigation features report unavailability and allow fallback options.

title: UI/UX Consistency and Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Verify the mobile app UI/UX is consistent, intuitive, and responsive on multiple supported devices and platforms.

steps.description: Launch the TripWise app on different mobile devices (iOS/Android) and screen sizes.
Verify UI elements are positioned correctly, fonts and colors are consistent, and navigation is intuitive.
Perform common user flows including login, trip planning, expense addition, and notifications.
Confirm no layout breakage, controls are reachable and touch interactions are smooth.
